entry.content: Specify up to four graphemes by symbol or features (sequence extends from left to right)
List only graphemes (consonants and vowels) which have been taught. The graphemes should be separated by a space. (e.g. p b m mp mb mpw mbw a e i o u aa)
List only graphemes (consonants and vowels) which have been taught. The graphemes should be separated by a space. (e.g. p b m mp mb mpw mbw a e i o u aa)
The default chart displays only simple consonants
Choose contexts to include as columns (maximun of six)
Define first grapheme class - list vertically
Define second grapheme class - list horizontally
Specify as C or V or S
Specify as C or V or S
Edit the list of taught graphemes, one grapheme per line

Initialize Grapheme Inventory from Text Data
Select the word list file to be used to initialize the grapheme inventory
Initialize Grapheme Inventory from Word List
This is a duplicate entry (same word)
Merge Word List - Ask Me Option
Enter the two graphemes for which you want minimal pairs
This search will identify any words in the story file that is not in the base file.
This allows you to identify new words in the story file (text data).

Do not include the back slash marker

Choose which items should be displayed when displaying a text data
Display paragraph, sentence and word number
List graphemes to be found in the phrases (a series of adjacent words in a sentence) in the text data. The graphemes should be separated by a space.
Minimal number of words in a phrase

This copies all the files associated with the PrimerPro project found in the From folder to the To folder
List graphemes that should be in the selected text data (story). The graphemes should be separated by a space.
All vowels in root are identical
Select sight words in story file
Edit the list of sight words (use lower case graphemes only), one word per line

Enter the grapheme for which you want tone minimal pairs
The default chart displays only short oral vowels
